articles.author: Andrew McDonald
articles.title: Farage to Musk: We can still be friends - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Nigel Farage wants to kiss and make up with Elon Musk — despite his backing for far-right agitator Tommy Robinson.
articles.content:
Farage, keen to make in-roads with his populist-right, anti-immigration Reform UK outfit has publicly distanced himself from Robinson and declared that he would not be welcome in Reform.
